channel.title: Posts on Erik Peralta Løvaas
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Erik Peralta Løvaas

item.title: Balkongentreprenøren AS (Oct 2019 - Sept 2019)
item.description: Start date: October 2019 End date: September 2020 Handling introduction of new internal systems. Development of internal software using Python with Flask and BeautifulSoup. Deployment on Heroku with PostgreSQL. Worked on constructing a new website through developing a custom Ghost theme.

item.title: Bachelor in Informatics (Aug 2019 - Jun 2022)
item.description: Institution: The Norwegian University of Science and Technology (NTNU). Start date: August 2019. End date: June 2022. Currently enrolled? Yes.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hugo is an open-source project and lives by the work of its contributors. There are plenty of open issues, and we need your help to make Hugo even more awesome. You don’t need to be a Go guru to contribute to the project’s development.

item.title: What is Hugo
item.description: Hugo is a fast and modern static site generator written in Go, and designed to make website creation fun again.
